duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet and exceed quarterly sales targets

Create, manage and execute a strategic territory coverage and sales plan that encourages multi-angle access into key accounts, with a focus on achieving revenue goals consistently on a quarterly and annual basis
Plan and manage both account and deal strategy. Identify, qualify, orchestrate and close new business within net new and existing opportunities
Maintain accurate pipeline management with expert-level forecasting
Develop a detailed understanding of organizational structure, competitive landscape and technology heat map within entire account lists
Implement an effective go-to-market strategy that takes into account evolving customer requirements, partners, funding and contract vehicles, marketing strategy, etc.

Prospect into targeted named accounts. Develop and execute field sales campaigns to create demand, work closely with Lead Generation and Sales Engineering resources to build and manage a robust pipeline of new business
Manage multiple complex sales processes simultaneously
Articulate the Indeni value proposition to prospects
Identify and quantify customer requirements, highlight ROI and business value through a consultative sales approach
Work within a team environment; manage internal and external resources to execute account and deal strategy and maximize sales efforts and success rate
